name: mode
description: Which should be used for mapping the pose to coordinates? Note that only the XZ Plane strategy is considered stable.
label: Mode
items: Map the frontal orthograpic view to openpose coordinates. You will get what you see in the front view viewport, independent of any camera.
Map the view of the first camera in the scene to openpose coordinates. You will get what you see in the camera view viewport. WARNING: This is approximate at best.
